A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm a moderate fan of the originals\, but this movie was bad. It felt stitched together and incohesive. When the plot didn't feel pointless it was disappointing\, with a lot of main characters being wasted. In addition to that there was some weird and goofy scenes that just really didn't fit in and were laughable. I thought it would be better\, but there was a severe lack of good decision making in this film.
